blocks.sub: A Group Gift They’ll Fight Over
blocks.title: Squall<sup>™</sup> 123R Snow Blower
blocks.copy: A compact snow blower that’s easy to handle, this single-stage model can clear snow up to 6" deep and grips the ground for minimum pushing effort with maximum clearing.

blocks.title: TB400 Leaf Blower
blocks.copy: This light yet powerful leaf blower is easy to start and comfortable to carry and use, making yard cleanup fast and fun.

blocks.title: TB4214 14" Gas Chainsaw
blocks.copy: This lightweight, compact chainsaw is perfect for trimming trees and limbs up to 12" in diameter, with an anti-vibration handle and design that makes it easy to use.

blocks.sub: The Tool for Trimming and Tapering Grass
blocks.title: TB25CB Curved Shaft String Trimmer
blocks.copy: This lightweight string trimmer is comfortable to use, easy to start and offers a great view of tight spots, thanks to its curved shaft.

blocks.sub: A Classic for the New Homeowner
blocks.title: TB16R Reel Lawn Mower
blocks.copy: An excellent choice for first-time yard tenders, this classic push lawn mower features high front wheels for maneuverability and offers nine height adjustments for that perfect cut.

blocks.title: TB225 Garden Cultivator
blocks.copy: Lightweight and easy to operate, the TB225 cultivator is perfect for weeding and loosening soil in small flower and garden beds.

blocks.title: TB25PS 25cc 8" Gas Pole Saw
blocks.copy: Ideal for cutting trees and limbs up to 4" in diameter, the TB25PS gas pole saw makes it easy to trim branches with a 12' reach and lightweight design.

blocks.sub: When You Can’t Pick Just One
blocks.title: TrimmerPlus Attachments
blocks.copy: Quickly and easily turn attachment-capable Troy-Bilt® trimmers into other handy tools, like a lawn edger, leaf blower, cultivator, pole saw, hedge trimmer or brushcutter.

blocks.title: Troy-Bilt Financing
blocks.copy: Get special financing on online purchases of new Troy-Bilt equipment, parts and accessories with the Troy-Bilt credit card. Restrictions apply.
